title: 7-31-17 Chat with Pat on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Chat with Pat Show 1/2 way mark show! On learning, Q&A and if you never heard how I started my show.. I tell all!
visit American Patchwork & Quilting at http://allpeoplequilt.com
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/apqmagazine
Visit host Pat Sloan at http://www.patsloan.com
